subject: Hello the account number ha
body:
Hello the account number has been updated to a savings account number take this your bank and deposit the pin and password vat to your administrator to enable processing to your home address
Here is the deposit information for Vat

subject: Re:    Hello the account number ha
body:
Hello there! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain what this is all about? Why do I need to deposit the pin and password vat?

Best wishes,
Margie
